body_html:
You are getting this error because the batch_size of validation_data is None. Since you are passing a dataset for training you don't need to specify a batch_size for that. As you don't specify the batch_size and pass arrays as input for validation data, it fails.

I would suggest using tf.data.Dataset for both training and validation or as you did by passing validation steps as a parameter. I hope this will unblock you.
